name: QrPay
description: QrPay is a payment system that allows you to pay for goods and services using a QR code.

name: Expense Manager
description: Expense Manager is a simple app to manage your daily expenses.

name: Hospital App
description: This project aims to develop a simple mobile application ui that serves as a platform to connect and link up hospitals.

name: Payment App
description: This project provides a sleek and modern interface for user authentication in payment apps.

name: Weather App
description: The Weather App is a simple flutter app that displays the weather of a city. It uses the OpenWeatherMap API to fetch the weather data.
